channel.title: 2006/317 [SPAWNING/::PURE AND ::MASTER] 2006PK - Strictly PKing
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://s10.postimage.org/wq6o27d2x/16lx13.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.hudsoncountynj.org/Data/SiteImages/FeatureIcons/home.gif[/img]Homepage: [url=http://www.06-pk.org]2006PK - Home[/url] [IMG]http://06-pk.org/forum/Themes/Bluefox_20RC5/images/icons/members.gif[/img] Forums: [url=http://www.06-pk.org/forum/]2006PK - Portal[/url] :D Webclient: [url=http://www.06-pk.org/play.php]2006PK - Play[/url]
[B]What is 06-PK?[/B]
06-PK or 2006PK, is a server designed for a user to create an account and login and put in the least amount of effort possible but yet still have fun PKing. 2006PK is a spawning server, this is in the sense that anything decorative a user may want to wear can be spawned, but anything rare or is used as a rare PKing item, cannot be.
[B]So what can I spawn?[/B]
You can spawn reasonable items for the most part. Party hats, whips, and barrows cannot be spawn. Instead, you get them through a system called 'Activity Points'.
[B]The Activity Points System[/B]
You get activity points by being active. You can get them from voting for us, staying logged in, killing players, killing bosses, getting a 99, anything. These activity points can be substituted for party hats, whips, etc, which can then be traded among users. This is to at least create an economy going around and a smile on a player's face when they get that whip loot :D It's really simple to play. You just login, type the commands MASTER or PURE, and voila! Start PKing! With the enjoyment of simplicity, pretty nice combat, and a recreation of the 2006 world of Runescape.
Here's some media to let you guys know what our server looks like:
[IMG]http://s12.postimage.org/lxyzslq25/prev.png[/img]
[IMG]http://s7.postimage.org/at6rycu7f/image.png[/img]
[IMG]http://s12.postimage.org/w6l32zsot/image.png[/img]
[IMG]http://s17.postimage.org/ovtzobzrj/image.png[/img]
What are you waiting for?! It'd be pretty stupid not to try!
[/CENTER]

I really don’t know what to say. It looks interesting (might give it a try) but Y U NO ADD MORE MEDIA?!
[/quote]

Download it and see it for yourself, stop whining.[/quote]

Am I whining? I’m simply telling him to add more media so his thread looks nicer, that’s all. Get your facts right next time, please.
kthnx

Read full topic

item.title: 2006/317 [SPAWNING/::PURE AND ::MASTER] 2006PK - Strictly PKing
item.dc:creator: @irKevin irKevin
item.description:
@irKevin wrote:

[CENTER]

16lx13.png900×120

Homepage: 2006PK - Home
Forums: 2006PK - Portal
Webclient: 2006PK - Play

What is 06-PK?

06-PK or 2006PK, is a server designed for a user to create an account and login and put in the least amount of effort possible but yet still have fun PKing. 2006PK is a spawning server, this is in the sense that anything decorative a user may want to wear can be spawned, but anything rare or is used as a rare PKing item, cannot be.

So what can I spawn?

You can spawn reasonable items for the most part. Party hats, whips, and barrows cannot be spawn. Instead, you get them through a system called ‘Activity Points’.

The Activity Points System

You get activity points by being active. You can get them from voting for us, staying logged in, killing players, killing bosses, getting a 99, anything. These activity points can be substituted for party hats, whips, etc, which can then be traded among users. This is to at least create an economy going around and a smile on a player’s face when they get that whip loot It’s really simple to play. You just login, type the commands MASTER or PURE, and voila! Start PKing! With the enjoyment of simplicity, pretty nice combat, and a recreation of the 2006 world of Runescape.

Here’s some media to let you guys know what our server looks like:

prev.png768×504

image.png767×509

image.png764×520

What are you waiting for?! It’d be pretty stupid not to try!

[/CENTER]
